TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Subscribe, demanding raw notifications (producer not supporting it)
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Consumer subscribes to a Producer's subscription list and receives raw notification that the producer is not supporting the requested data.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer sends a subscription request to a Producer for a published topic requesting to receive a raw notifications if the producer is not supporting the requested data.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumer has subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the consumer receives raw notification that the producer is not supporting the topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Producer (A) publishes a subscription list including message type relating to 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer (B) subscribes to the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic and requests raw notification if Producer (A) is not supporting the subscription data.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Producer (A) receives the subscription request for the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic from Consumer (A) and sends raw notification to Consumer (B) that the producer is not supporting the request.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer (B) received the raw notification from Producer (A) that the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic is not supported.
